articles.title: About John
articles.contents: Outside of work you can generally find me spending time with my amazing partner Elizabeth, tinkering in the workshop, or napping with our cats. Also, go Reds!

articles.title: John Kubale, PhD
articles.description: Postdoctoral Research Fellow Department of Epidemiology University of Michigan School of Public Health [](mailto:jkubale@umich.edu) [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/john-kubale-382120b4/) [](https://twitter.com/JKubale)
articles.contents:
Biography

I am an infectious disease epidemiologist and Postdoctoral Research Fellow working in Dr. Aubree Gordon’s lab. My research focuses on respiratory viruses particularly respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) and influenza. Specifically, I am interested in exploring the social, biological, and environmental drivers of severe respiratory illness associated with these pathogens.
Education
PhD in Epidemiology, 2020 University of Michigan
MPH in Epidemiology, 2017 University of Michigan
B.A. Liberal Arts, 2011 Xavier University

Create using Distill for R Markdown
Last updated 30 November, 2020
